column1: In the early versions of J.R.R. Tolkiens legendarium (see: The Book of Lost Tales Part One)
column2: the Falmari were known as Solosimpi ("Pipers of the Shores")
column3: while the name Teleri was given to the clan of Elves known as the Vanyar.

column1: Their leader was Thingol but after he was lost
The Solosimpi dwelt in Alqualondë but many were Kinslaying at Alqualondë by the Gnomes under Fëanor.
